Name: American Beauty (by Trader Vic)
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
Instructions: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Use the back of a soup spoon to FLOAT port over drink.
Review: Invigorating and peppermint-fresh yet sophisticated and complex.
History: Adapted from Victor Bergeron's Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide (1972 revised edition).
Nutrition: One serving of American Beauty (by Trader Vic) contains 206 calories
